title: Row with Centre escalates after Gandapur ultimatum
text: khan peshawar row centre khyber pakhtunkhwa loadshedding ostensibly settled last month resurrected wednesday kp chief minister ali amin gandapur issued ultimatum telling peshawar electric supply company pesco reduce outages grids hours day pesco among distribution companies whose power losses high per cent last month energy minister awais leghari explained feeders losses per cent would face hours outages backdrop agreement reached end may sides agreeing address issue soon however outages continued plague kp cm gandapur dera ismail khan eid holidays visited local grid station directed staff ensure loadshedding exceed hours day issued similar directives rest province asked lawmakers ensure similar vein number pti lawmakers visited respective grid stations across province including provincial capital forcibly end loadshedding eid holidays meanwhile mr leghari approached interior ministry issue cm tells pesco reduce outages hours visits grid station resume supply leghari seeks interior ministry intervention letter addressed interior minister mohsin naqvi energy minister said kp police registering firs entered grid stations restored supply also shared report issued ceo pesco payment rs trillion owed province centre various heads said pm contacted support international monetary fund imf deal adding want province money first otherwise tell imf federal government borrowed visits grid stations lawmakers like haji fazal elahi already mr elahi visited rehman baba grid station forcibly restored power supply high loss feeders pesco spokesperson told dawn action resulted tripping grid plunged large part provincial capital prolonged darkness rehman baba grid supplies power feeders peshawar tripping also affected grid stations said saturday tuesday mr elahi intruded premises grid station video social media showed lying cot inside grid tuesday last saturday entered power grid heading large protest restored power supply feeders undergoing scheduled outages pesco title: Pakistan's Mushahid Hussain creates history at BRICS forum
text: islamabad senator mushahid hussain syed created history becoming first pakistani address official international brics forum hosted russia far eastern port vladivostok keynote address forum syed said pakistan interested joinin brics wants part new emerging order global south highlighted pakistan member un security council robust voice peace justice oppressed also thanked russia china principled position gaza genocide last year august senator mushahid hussain sayed became first pakistan address seminar brics group major emerging economies johannesburg development came pakistan government received invitation bloc comprising brazil russia india china south africa first time south asian country participation encouraged beijing sharing historic experience social media platform x mushahid hussain said addressed brics seminar johannesburg brics summit tomorrow first pakistani invited brics event growing body countries queue membership

title: How many Pakistani pilgrims died during Hajj 2024?
text: amid reports pakistan ministry religious affairs confirmed least nine pakistanis died hajj ministry also urged public avoid rumors circulating social media regarding number casualties hajj deaths different rumours spread online pakistani ministry cautioned people seek accurate information credible sources regarding hajj pilgrimage ministry also responded well pakistani pilgrims including allegations mismanagement mina stay dg hajj turned claims saying ministry relies information provided saudi government verify ministry religious affairs revealed four deaths reported mina three arafat two muzdalifah pakistan hajj mission remains vigilant mashair days ensuring comfort pilgrims official said

title: Israeli tanks push deeper into Rafah, forcing people to flee again
text: israeli tanks backed warplanes drones advanced deeper western part gaza strip city rafah wednesday killing eight people according residents palestinian medics residents said tanks moved five neighbourhoods midnight heavy shelling gunfire hit tents displaced families al mawasi area west coastal enclave said eight months war sign let fighting efforts international mediators backed united states failed persuade israel hamas agree ceasefire twelve palestinians also killed israeli strike hit group citizens merchants south gaza strip medical sources told reuters wednesday people hit waited convoys aid trucks carrying goods kerem shalom crossing salahuddin road northeast rafah sources added israeli forces laid waste much gaza seized palestinian territory yet achieve israel stated goal wiping hamas freeing israeli hostages medics hamas media said eight palestinians killed al mawasi many families fled north panic identify fatalities israeli military said looking report residents said israeli army forces blew several homes western rafah sheltered half gaza million people last month israel began ground offensive forced population head northwards read killed israeli strikes hit nuseirat bureij refugee camps gaza united nations palestinian figures put remained people another night horror rafah opened fire planes drones tanks western areas cover invasion said one rafah resident asked named bullets shells landed mawasi area near people slept killing wounding many told reuters via chat app israeli commander briefing military correspondents rafah tuesday named two locations shaboura tel al sultan army planned take hamas fighters hamas battalions yet well worn need dismantle completely estimate less month intensity colonel liron batito head givati brigade told army radio israeli military remained control border rafah egypt footage circulated social media showed rafah crossing window gaza population outside world destroyed buildings burnt israeli tanks positioned flag israel flying places israeli military said aid gaza impeded damage north israel sent column tanks back zeitoun neighbourhood gaza city residents reported heavy fire tanks warplanes also sounds gun battles hamas led fighters israel ground air campaign triggered hamas stormed southern israel oct killing around people seizing hostages according israeli tallies offensive left gaza ruins killed people according palestinian health authorities left much population homeless destitute

title: Eid ul Adha third day being celebrated with animals’ sacrifice
text: islamabad people wednesday continued sacrificing animals taking part festivities third day eid al adha muslims celebrating eidul adha feast sacrifice religious fervour commemorate great sacrifice hazrat ibrahim hazrat ismael faithful slaughtering sacrificial animals remembrance sunnat e ibrahimi third day eid civic authorities cities towns alert made special arrangements disposal offal remains slaughtered animals three days eidul adha remains sacrifice animals taken areas karachi timely also complaints neighborhoods sanitary workers ignoring removal offal resulting unhygienic conditions general public eidul adha one two eid festivals observed muslim faithful commemorate prophet ibrahim willingness sacrifice son god traditionally marked slaughter animals whose meat shared family members poor pakistan government announced three day holiday eid monday wednesday

title: Eidul Adha: Punjab CM announces cash prize for outstanding cleanliness measures
text: lahore punjab chief minister cm maryam nawaz announced cash prize equal one month salary staff participated three day operation cleanup occasion eidul adha praising efforts team said officers staff municipal departments solid waste management companies written new history public service especially ongoing intense heat maryam nawaz appreciated team added dream saaf suthra punjab clean punjab becoming reality earlier prime minister shehbaz sharif also appreciated chief minister punjab maryam nawaz sharif team excellent cleanliness public service three days eidul adha read eidul adha sacrifice animals festivities continue second day appreciation message prime minister said well done punjab well done maryam nawaz prime minister said hard work team scorching heat commendable expressed hope standard public service maintained also improve
